entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor `CheckFeatureAvailability` to not accept a `Location` parameter #68935
  • Consider caching `SyntaxNode.Location` #68934
  • Update `ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol` to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray for type arguments #68933

Closed

  • Optimize+ doesn't seem to fully discard all unreachable code #68929
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Report nullable safety warnings (vs. "W"-warnings) for assignments to captured primary constructor parameters. #68931
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Update analyzers to 23356.2 #68916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle exceptions from DiagnosticSuppressor.SupportedSuppressions in IDE #68894
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • EnC analyzer refactoring: Abstract member bodies #68910
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68928
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE, untriaged
